meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>origin</kanji> <kanji>villain</kanji> is the villain who's running everything. They're the person responsible for the villainy going on. They are the <vocabulary>ringleader</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>main culprit</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
